attributes.action: Reconsider the decision to overturn an amendment to the Agriculture Bill
attributes.additional_details:
The Conservative manifesto promised: "We will not compromise on our high environmental protection, animal welfare and food standards”.

Start fulfilling said promise.
attributes.background: Reconsider the decision to overturn a House of Lords amendment to the Agriculture Bill which requires agricultural and food imports to meet domestic standards

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what policy you'd like to change.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You might like to sign these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326837
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321419
